Data Fields

uint16_t tunnelId

Detailed Description

Format of the ReadyData Command Payload. See ZigBee Smart Energy Profile Specification r17, Figure D.43.

Definition at line 599 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

Field Documentation

uint16_t _ZclReadyDataPayload_t::tunnelId

A number between 0..65535 that uniquely identifies the tunnel that has been allocated in the server.

Definition at line 603 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.

uint16_t _ZclReadyDataPayload_t::numberOfBytesLeft

Indicates the number of octets that may be received by the initiator of this command (receiver). See ZSE Profile Spec. r17, D.6.2.4.6.2, page 281.

Definition at line 607 of file zclSmartEnergyTunnelCluster.h.
